Sinan (Ancient Chinese Compass) Style (Simplified)

Source: R/annotation_compass.R
compass_sinan.Rd

Sinan (Ancient Chinese Compass) Style (Simplified)

Usage

compass_sinan(
  line_col = "black",
  square_pad = 0.1,
  ring_outer = 0.35,
  ring_ratio = 0.65,
  labels = c("N", "E", "S", "W"),
  text_size = 12,
  text_face = "plain",
  text_family = "",
  text_col = "black",
  label_offset = 0.05,
  spoon_fill = "black",
  spoon_col = "black",
  spoon_scale = 0.8,
  inner_fill = "lightgrey",
  square_width = 2,
  outer_width = 2,
  inner_width = 1,
  spoon_width = 1
)

Value

A grob representing a simplified "Sinan"-inspired compass.

On this page
